attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The entertainer, Bruce Forsyth, has given more than 6 decades of  outstanding contribution in Entertainment, and not forgetting his unstinting work for charity. The support for his knighthood has included a motion by 41 MP’s in the House of Commons in February 2008, 2 previous petitions on the No.10 website and our “Give Bruce Forsyth a Knighthood” Group on the Facebook site. More than 25,000 have voted online at this time.
The knighthood will be the ultimate lifetime achievement award for Mr Forsyth

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
